ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Magnificent!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then praise your Lord, the most supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So glorify the name of your Great Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Great One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) proclaim the Purity of the name of your Lord, the Greatest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, glorify with praises the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore glorify the name of your Lord, the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefor (O Muhammad) praise the name of thy Lord, the Tremendous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore hallow thou the name of thy Lord, the Mighty!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So celebrate the Name of your Lord, the All-supreme!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So celebrate with praises the name of thy Lord, the Supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So glorify with praises the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So exalt the Name of your Lord, the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Magnificent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:96] So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Tremendous (as [explained] above [in verse 74]).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore (0 Muhammad) praise the name of thy Lord, the Tremendous) therefore pray by the command of your Lord, the Mighty; and it is also said that this means: remember the divine Oneness of your Lord, the Mighty, Who is more tremendous than all there is'. 0- And of the surah in which Iron is mentioned which is all Meccan or Medinan, and which consists of 29 verses, 544 words and 2,446 letters: Surah 57: Iron (al-Hadid) And of the surah in which Iron is mentioned which is all Meccan or Medinan, 26 and which consists of 29 verses, 544 words and 2,446 letters:
